A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointing! Dazzling effects and cgi making the space battles and fights enjoyable. Lack of character development and background story from snoke and Rey. Pointless scenes including the casino. Reinvention of 'the force' with Leia scene\, kylo and Rey communication and lukes abilities. Overall a confusing and unsatisfactory plot  for the star wars series but an alright film.
